content.Activities: This is a placeholder text for various activities available at the festival site, such as bungee-jumping, ski-jumping, show jumping, chromosome jumping and so forth.

content.Cloakroom: The cloakrooms are available there, there and there. The cost for storing your jacket and bag is as follows. The organizer is probably not responsible for what happens if you lose your cloakroom token.
